name: Jigsaw puzzles for baby. Toys
description:
Simple puzzles for young children.
Educational puzzles. Game for children from 3-7 years. The game helps to develop logic, fine motor skills, ingenuity, attention.

- Beautiful, simple, natural interface that is simple and easy to use;
- You can make your own puzzle by taking a picture from camera or take picture from gallery!
- Fun puzzles for adults and children.

Now your kids will never lose the small details!
